# Accessible content {#sec-accessible-content}

@sec-index-results and @sec-country-profiles include interactive charts and
text content using JavaScript, this content may not be fully accessible.

You can find non-interactive versions of these chapters here:

* [Results of the 2019 InCiSE Index (accessible version)]("Y_results_static.qmd")
* [Country profiles (accessible version)]("Z_00_country_profiles_static.qmd")
